DOC.brief_summary: Previous studies have suggested that premature luteinization (PL)during controlled ovarian stimulation (COS) decreases the implantation rate due to a negative effect on the endometrium receptivity. This study aims to describe the impact on endometrial gene expression of PL in GnRH antagonist and GnRH agonist cycles.
DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Gene Expression Profile in Controlled Ovarian Stimulation Cycles With Premature Luteinization
DOC.criteria: Oocyte donors Age between 1835 years old BMI 1829 NORMOGONADOTROPHICS PROGESTERONE â‰¥ 1.2 ng/ml on hCG day PolyCystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS) Endometriosis
